welcome_message_body: Welcome to New Braunfels, where the charm of our historic German heritage meets the beauty of the Texas Hill Country. We invite you to explore our vibrant downtown, relax on the banks of the Guadalupe River, and savor the unique experiences our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Antonio International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
